Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to maintenance of records regarding the issuance of alteration permits for cellular telephone antennas and equipment.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Maintenance of records regarding the issuance of alteration permits for cellular telephone antennas and equipment.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to area eligibility limitations on benefits pursuant to section four hundred twenty-one-a of the real property tax law.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Area eligibility limitations on benefits pursuant to section 421-a of the real property tax law.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to maintenance of records regarding the issuance of alteration permits for cellular telephone antennas and equipment.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Maintenance of records regarding the issuance of alteration permits for cellular telephone antennas and equipment.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to area eligibility limitations on benefits pursuant to section four hundred twenty-one-a of the real property tax law.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Area eligibility limitations on benefits pursuant to section 421-a of the real property tax law.
